sentence.Network_en: The crowd is heading eastward, believing that they can find gold there.
sentence.Network_cn: 人群正在向东移去, 他们认为在那里可以找到黄金.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... eastern 东方的 eastward 向东的 easy 容易的.
航海及海运专业英语词汇(E1) ... eastsoutheast 东南东东南东 eastward 向东;东方的 eastward 向东东方的.
The impact of NATO enlargement eastward on Russia ' s foreign policy ., 北约东扩对俄罗斯对外政策的冲击.
英语单词立体记忆 ... → eastern 东方的，朝东的 → eastward 朝东的 → the Easter 复活节.

list.abs: 大石头站 DASHITOU ... 镇中心 the center of town 向东看 looking eastward 大石头镇 Railway Cross.
a river in northeastern Kansas ; flows eastward to become a tributary of the Missouri River ., 堪萨斯州东北的一条河流 ; 东流成为密苏里河的一条支流.
when it concerns to external factors I to analyse the reasons the background of EU eastward expansion and global industry transfer .外部因素则侧重于从欧盟东扩以及全球产业转移等大背景来分析其原因。
arc of the celestial equator eastward from the vernal equinox ., 从春分点沿天赤道向东测量所得的角度.

entry.def: Eastward or eastwards means towards the east.

example.ex: A powerful snow storm is moving eastward...
example.tran: 一场强暴风雪正在东移。

example.ex: They were pressing on eastwards towards the city's small airfield.
example.tran: 他们继续向东朝该市的小机场推进。
